item.description:
Please register for this party at www.meetup.com/Single-Parent-Party

Everyone is welcome with children and without. 19 are attending so far. We will have 25 by tomorrow night-July 10th.

We value diversity in religions, nationalities, and ethnic backgrounds. We cooperate as a team to be successful by inviting other professional people we know.


Organizer/Host- Richard Tosti

1. "Time of party: 7:00PM -9:00pm"
2. " Dress code- "business casual" or summer casual- No shoes, jeans, - stockings good, slipppers great!


Purpose is to Socialize with similar people of your age who are searching for a lifetime partner.

Nonsmokers- inside my home

Please invite other friends. If you are single without children and want a partner with children then you are also invited.

This group was formed on the principle of synergy. Working together to invite quality single parents. We must take responsibility for inviting people. My personal goal is to always have an equal ratio of men and women, hope you will help.

Men bring wine,soda or beer
Women bring a light appetizer

Maximum - 30 guests only.

Let's have fun!

Location: -You will see open house signs-simple
My Home
36 Woodridge Road
Westwood, MA

The best is yet to be!

Richard Tosti
item.how_to_find_us: Welcome you at the door with a Welcoming Smile!
item.name: Singles Home Party
